sample_docs: Viante is a leading developer of Facial Recognition Technology and advanced biometric algorithms, proven by being ranked in NIST TOP 5 Viante is a leading developer of Facial Recognition Technology and advanced biometric algorithms, proven by being ranked in NIST TOP 5 We offer a range of solutions to improve operations in various industries, including security, access control, traffic control, law enforcement, digital document management, identity verification, fraud prevention, retail analytics, crowd management, and event planning. We offer a range of solutions to improve operations in various industries, including security, access control, traffic control, law enforcement, digital document management, identity verification, fraud prevention, retail analytics, crowd management, and event planning. Viante's Face Recognition product is an innovative technology that analyzes facial features to create a unique biometric template for each individual . Our product is easily integrated and can be customized according to the specific needs of enterprises and organizations. In retail , financial sector and many other areas. Security is a product line computer vision solutions that provide reliable and accurate security applications . Includes features such as crowd estimation and person detection , which utilize state-of-the-art algorithms and machine learning systems to analyze video streams in real-time. We are committed to providing advanced technology and reliable performance to enhance security and safety measures in today's fast-paced and ever-changing world.

Our was posted on 20 April 2023 and last updated on 20 April 2023. 1 . Purpose of the policy and Company information 1.1 . Computer Vision Technologies FZ-LCC (trademark - Viante) is the owner of this website. The company's office is located in Dubai Media City, Building 05, Dubai, UAE. 1.2 . This document (here and further – « », «Policy») was created and posted to resolve the issue of confidentiality of personal data of users who visit the Viante website. 1.3 . The Policy is publicly available on the Intranet on the company's website and may change at any time. The current version of policy can always be found on the page at the link: https://viante.ai/ 2 . and definitions 2.1 . The following are used in this : Website – a website located at viante.ai. User - an individual who uses the Site. Personal data - any information relating directly or indirectly to a specific or identifiable individual (subject of personal data). Personal data processing - any action (operation) or combination of actions (operations) performed with or without the use of automation tools with personal data, including collection, writing, systematization, accumulation, storage, clarification (updating, modification), extraction, use, transfer (distribution, provision, access), depersonalization, blocking, deletion, destruction of personal data. Confidentiality of personal data is a mandatory requirement for the Viante or other person who has access to personal data to prevent their dissemination without the consent of the subject of personal data or the presence of other legal grounds. Cookies are a small piece of data sent by the web server and stored on the user's computer, which the web client or web browser sends to the web server each time in an HTTP request when trying to open a page of the corresponding site. Such User data is collected using Internet statistics services, used to collect information about User actions on the Site, improve the quality of the Site and its content. IP address - a unique network address of a node in a computer network built using the IP protocol. 3 . PURPOSES OF COLLECTING USER'S PERSONAL INFORMATION 3.1 . Viante may use the User's personal data for the purposes of Providing a response to the User's request Conducting business communication regarding technological solutions presented on the Website and owned by Viante Conclusion, execution and termination of civil law contracts 3.2 . Personal data processing is carried out on the basis of the following principles: Legality of the purposes and methods of personal data processing Compliance of the purposes of personal data processing with the purposes previously defined and declared when collecting personal data, as well as the authority of the site administration; Compliance of the volume and nature of the processed personal data, methods of processing personal data with the purposes of processing personal data. 3.3 . Personal data of Users is not transferred to any third parties. 3.4 . Sometimes you will find links to third party sites on our web site. Please note that this online does not automatically apply to these third party sites. 3.5 . Viante uses cookies to track repeat visitors, the structure of visits and the frequency of responses to special offers or promotions that we may distribute 4 . Data Subject Rights 4.1 . Personal data subjects have the following rights: The right of access; The right to rectification; The right to restriction of processing; The right to object; The right to not be subject to automated individual decision-making resulting in decisions having legal or significant effects; The right to data portability; The right to erasure ('right to be forgotten') 4.2 . Questions regarding data storage, recovery, and deletion should be directed to: info@viante.ai 5 . The order of collection, storage, transfer and other types of processing personal data 5.1 . The security of personal data processed by the Viante is ensured through the implementation of legal, organizational and technical measures necessary to fully comply with the requirements of the current legislation in the field of personal data protection. 5.2 . The Viante ensures the safety of personal data and takes all possible measures to exclude access to the personal data of unauthorized persons. 5.3 . The User's personal data will never, under any circumstances, be unauthorized transferred to other third parties, except in cases related to the implementation of current legislation. 5.4 . In case of inaccuracies in personal data, the User can update them independently by sending a notification to the Viante to the Viante's email address info@viante.ai marked "Updating of personal data". 5.5 . The period of processing of personal data is unlimited. The User can withdraw his consent to the processing of personal data at any time by sending a notification to the Viante to the Viante's email address marked "Withdrawal of consent to the processing of personal data". 6 . Cross-border transfer of personal data 6.1 . Before the start of the cross-border transfer of personal data, the Viante is obliged to make sure that the foreign state to whose territory the transfer of personal data is supposed to be carried out provides reliable protection of the rights of personal data subjects. 6.2 . The cross-border transfer of personal data on the territory of foreign states that do not meet the above requirements can only be carried out if the personal data subject agrees in writing to the cross-border transfer of his personal data and/or the execution of the contract, the party of which is the personal data subject.
